attributes.title: Bayesian expected loss: Telling a complete story with data
attributes.summary: We learn how about the problems with (frequentist) statistical significance and how we can tell a (more) complete and clear story with data on expected losses.
attributes.description:
We learn how about the problems with (frequentist) statistical significance and how we can tell a (more) complete and clear story with data on expected losses.



<!-- GUESTS START -->
Guest: Iqbal Ali
URL: https://www.cro.cafe/guest/iqbal-ali
<!-- GUESTS END -->
